name: The Only Dragon Left
description:
You are the last dragon, and you are being hunted.

Destroy the skyship before it destroys you. Dodge the bullets, collect the dragon eggs, and do enough damage to the ship to take it down.

You only have enough energy for one special attack. Use it wisely.

Controls 

  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • Z - Shoot
  • X - Special Attack

This is a submission for the GMTK Game Jam
